problems.title: Find the Maximum Element in a Max Heap
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array representation of a Max Heap. Your task is to find the maximum element in the heap.
In a Max Heap, the maximum element is always present at the root index (0).
If the heap is empty (N = 0), print "Heap is Empty".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
50 30 20 15 10

Sample Output
50

Explanation:
The root of the Max Heap (index 0) contains the largest value.
hintsList: In a Max Heap, the root node (index 0) contains the maximum value.
Just return heap[0] if heap size is greater than zero.
